about.title: About Me
about.description1: Hello! I am José Murga, a web developer with a passion for creating modern and functional web applications. I have experience in Frontend:
about.description4: focusing on the creation of Management Systems, ERP, CRM, among others.
about.description5: I enjoy solving problems and continually learning to improve my skills. I am committed to offering efficient and user-centered solutions. I can carry out everything from design to deployment of the application as required, I adapt to the way of working whether in a team or independently.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description.1: Development of web applications using Angular 18, .NET 8, Node.js, and use of Azure resources.
experience.description.2: Design, analysis, and full stack development of banking applications using Angular 16, .NET Core, and SQL Server.
experience.description.3: Migration of .NET MVC system to Angular 13 + .NET API.
experience.description.4: Layout, design, analysis, and full stack development of ERP-type web applications using Angular 12, .NET Core, and SQL Server.
experience.description.5: Design, analysis, and full stack development of a health web system using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, .NET (Azure Functions), and SQL Server.
experience.description.6: Development of applications using C#, ASP .NET, and Angular.
experience.description.7: Design, analysis, and full stack development of the company's ERP system using C#, SQL Server, HTML-CSS, and TypeScript with .NET Core and Angular.
experience.description.8: Full stack development of company web information systems using C#, SQL Server, HTML-CSS, and Angular in .NET.
